Library Buddies
30  April,  2024
As part of the “Library Buddies” series of events
,
in collaboration with Al Rayan University College, the Best Buddies program organized a series of workshops titled "Library Buddies
.
” These activities aim to integrate members of the Citizen chapter with their peers from the Best Buddies club on campus, promoting integration into university life and engaging in various library-related activities.
